The task of the Hackathon organized by the Data Science Association Munich in cooperation with NASA was to hand in a Data Analysis report alongside its source code for a provided space related data set.
My final 1st place ranking was determined based on the following evaluation criteria: Data cleaning, descriptive statistics, the proposal and explorative analysis of a hypothesis, informative visualizations and code readablilty.

Most important tools chosen: {{< fa brands r-project >}}, {rmarkdown}, packages from the {tidyverse}
